entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 11 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries or drizzle changing to 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
